headline: Why Analysts See ChargePoint Holdings CHPT Story Shifting After US5 Price Target Reset
summary: ChargePoint’s latest update keeps its fair value estimate steady at US$10.1875 per share, with the 12.5% discount rate and 14.26% revenue growth assumption also unchanged, even as Street research has reset headline price targets such as the US$5 level highlighted by Goldman Sachs. This mix of steady core inputs, combined with analysts rethinking how quickly the business can scale and control cash burn, reflects a narrative that is being recalibrated rather than completely rewritten. As you...
